alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:27AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Perry and northwestern Morgan Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 226 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Granville South to near Logan. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Lexington, McConnelsville, Somerset, Shawnee, Perry State Forest, Thornport, Harbor Hills, Crooksville, Thornville, Junction City, New Straitsville, Malta, Corning, Glenford, Hemlock, Rendville and Eagleport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
